      • arePlacementConstraintsRespected

        public abstract boolean arePlacementConstraintsRespected(int newRow,
                                                         int newColumn,
                                                         Dice chosenDie,
                                                         Player player)
        PlacementConstraint Checker This method verifies if constraints are respected or not
        Parameters:
        newRow - row in which the player wanna set the die after the application of the ToolCard
        newColumn - column in which the player wanna set the die after the application of the ToolCard
        chosenDie - is the die chosen on which wil be applied the effects of the chosen ToolCard
        player - is the player that bought the ToolCard
        Returns:
        true if is possible to apply the move after the application of the ToolCard, false otherwise
